# Generative AI Project

This project structure is designed for scalability and separation of concerns in GenAI applications.

## Structure
- `config/`: Configuration files for models and logging.
- `data/`: Local data storage (cache, embeddings, vector DB).
- `src/`: Core application logic (LLM abstraction, RAG, processing).
- `tests/`: Unit and integration tests.
- `scripts/`: Automation and maintenance scripts.
